title: Orcs
description: Orcs are tall and are muscular with green skin and violent eyes, they thrive in forests and perilous terrains, wielding heavy weapons to dominate foes with brute strength.

title: Dwarves
description: Dwarves are short and muscular with tan skin and hazel eyes, they are skilled miners, blacksmiths, and warriors, wielding earth magic alongside war hammers and axes.
